about_the_game: Free single player demo with one level to try out! The full version has much more content and local multiplayer for up to 4 players.
detailed_description: Free single player demo with one level to try out! The full version has much more content and local multiplayer for up to 4 players.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: 2,53 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Monterey
  • Processor: 2,2 GHz 6-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: PAKO Caravan Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2,53 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Single player demo with one level!
